sense.def: Illness Sign of a tendency to easily become angry as if one were insane. LSZ speaks of this condition as yi nu ru kuang 易怒如狂 , “to easily become angry as if one were insane”. Su wen 素問 46: 有病怒狂者，此病安生 , “Someone suffers from anger with madness ; how does this disease emerge?” Nü lao 女勞 , exhaustion with women [1]

Etiological Agent. identical with fang lao 房勞 , bedchamber exhaustion. Jin gui yao lue 金匱要略 Mj: 黃家， 日晡所發熱，而反惡寒，此為女勞得之 , “A jaundice patient effused heat inthe late afternoon but nevertheless had an aversion to cold. He got this as a result of an exhaustion with women.
